recipesJson.name: Dragon's Breath Milk
recipesJson.author: KillaCoDe
recipesJson.description:
This milk is  so rich, creamy and smooth! I basically made a baby with all of the other milk recipes out there and took some of the best parts and combined them all into one milk. 

I am a huge S&C fan and as a new mixer wanted to make up my own iteration of an S&C to see how it goes. You can pretty much vape it right away but i do suggest at least 3-5 days of steeping to give the flavors time to bind and settle some.

Update: Dropped the Dragonfruit 1% just for better overall balance but you can still keep it at 6% if you liked the extra kick the dragonfruit gives the profile. 


Inspired by God Milk, Mother of God's Milk and Dragon's Milk

***If you mix this, please leave a review and let me know what you think or if you think there is something that could be changed to make it better!***

reviews.text: As described, it's a basic S & C...maybe a little thin in the age of Rose Milk and the like, but it's definitely got a crisp and vibrant strawberry flavor.  I definitely liked it enough to mix it again.
